title: Poster, Exhibition Poster: Robert Mangold, Kunsthalle, Basel, 1977
title_raw: Exhibition Poster: Robert Mangold, Kunsthalle, Basel
inscribed: Imprinted at top left corner: "KUNSTHALLE BASEL/ 12. März - 11. April täglich 10 - 12 und 14 - 18/ Mittwoch auch 20 -22, Sonntag 10 -12 und 14 -17/ ROBERT MANGOLD"
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Art exhibition poster on gray background with white border.  Text is placed in upper left corner; image is at bottom.   The image shows an outline drawing of a shaped canvas, comprised of a a black outline of a square(left) abutted to half of a semicircle (right).  Within the square is a red-line arc; within the segment of a circle is a right angle in gray.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Exhibition Poster: Robert Mangold, Kunsthalle, Basel, 1977. Offset lithograph on white paper. 
Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-19
